article_title: Walgreens Unlikely To Make Rite Aid's PBM A Priority

article_metadata.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance will obtain a pharmacy benefit manager once its acquisition of Rite Aid closes in the second half of this year but Walgreens CEO Stefano Pessina said the smaller EnvisionRx PBM would be too small to be "considered a true competitor."
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen

og.description: Walgreens Boots Alliance will obtain a pharmacy benefit manager once its acquisition of Rite Aid closes in the second half of this year but Walgreens CEO Stefano Pessina said the smaller EnvisionRx PBM would be too small to be "considered a true competitor."
